name: The Evolution
description:
Start as a fish, run from other hostiles around you, eat specific food types in order to adapt the surface.  In surface, deal with both hunger and thirst. Eat little bugs around you and drink water from ponds. 

Controls:

First stage:

Left click to move

Right click while move to dash, dash ability uses energy

Food types:

 Blue foods give you energy

Red ones drain energy from you

 Green foods trigger a trap when you eat them, this trap kills enemy fishes                            around   it

Yellow foods are the ones that can adapt you to surface, eat 10 of them and go                to surface as a lizard.

Second Stage:

W,A,S,D to move

Space to bite

Shift while moving to Dash  

Hunger and Thrist:

You lose hunger while in surface, in order to restore it, you need to eat bugs around you. The more a bug is slow the more it gives you less food.

You lose water in surface too, go to a near water(it should be colored bright) tile and the lizard starts to drink the water.

Be carefull. If you run out of Hunger or Water, you will die.

In order to finish the game, you should eat 10 flying bug.
